00021 __device_inline void kernel_write_pass_float(__global float *buffer, int sample, float value)
00022 {
00023     __global float *buf = buffer;
00024     *buf = (sample == 0)? value: *buf + value;
00025 }
00026 
00027 __device_inline void kernel_write_pass_float3(__global float *buffer, int sample, float3 value)
00028 {
00029     __global float3 *buf = (__global float3*)buffer;
00030     *buf = (sample == 0)? value: *buf + value;
00031 }
00032 
00033 __device_inline void kernel_write_pass_float4(__global float *buffer, int sample, float4 value)
00034 {
00035     __global float4 *buf = (__global float4*)buffer;
00036     *buf = (sample == 0)? value: *buf + value;
00037 }
00038 
00039 __device_inline void kernel_write_data_passes(KernelGlobals *kg, __global float *buffer, PathRadiance *L,
00040     ShaderData *sd, int sample, int path_flag, float3 throughput)
00041 {
00042 #ifdef __PASSES__
00043     if(!(path_flag & PATH_RAY_CAMERA))
00044         return;
00045 
00046     int flag = kernel_data.film.pass_flag;
00047 
00048     if(!(flag & PASS_ALL))
00049         return;
00050     
00051     /* todo: add alpha treshold */
00052     if(!(path_flag & PATH_RAY_TRANSPARENT)) {
00053         if(sample == 0) {
00054             if(flag & PASS_DEPTH) {
00055                 Transform tfm = kernel_data.cam.worldtocamera;
00056                 float depth = len(transform_point(&tfm, sd->P));
00057 
00058                 kernel_write_pass_float(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_depth, sample, depth);
00059             }
00060             if(flag & PASS_OBJECT_ID) {
00061                 float id = object_pass_id(kg, sd->object);
00062                 kernel_write_pass_float(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_object_id, sample, id);
00063             }
00064             if(flag & PASS_MATERIAL_ID) {
00065                 float id = shader_pass_id(kg, sd);
00066                 kernel_write_pass_float(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_material_id, sample, id);
00067             }
00068         }
00069 
00070         if(flag & PASS_NORMAL) {
00071             float3 normal = sd->N;
00072             kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_normal, sample, normal);
00073         }
00074         if(flag & PASS_UV) {
00075             float3 uv = make_float3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f); /* todo: request and lookup */
00076             kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_uv, sample, uv);
00077         }
00078     }
00079 
00080     if(flag & (PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT|PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR|PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT))
00081         L->color_diffuse += shader_bsdf_diffuse(kg, sd)*throughput;
00082     if(flag & (PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT|PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR|PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT))
00083         L->color_glossy += shader_bsdf_glossy(kg, sd)*throughput;
00084     if(flag & (PASS_TRANSMISSION_INDIRECT|PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR|PASS_TRANSMISSION_DIRECT))
00085         L->color_transmission += shader_bsdf_transmission(kg, sd)*throughput;
00086 #endif
00087 }
00088 
00089 __device_inline void kernel_write_light_passes(KernelGlobals *kg, __global float *buffer, PathRadiance *L, int sample)
00090 {
00091 #ifdef __PASSES__
00092     int flag = kernel_data.film.pass_flag;
00093 
00094     if(!kernel_data.film.use_light_pass)
00095         return;
00096     
00097     if(flag & PASS_DIFFUSE_INDIRECT)
00098         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_diffuse_indirect, sample, L->indirect_diffuse);
00099     if(flag & PASS_GLOSSY_INDIRECT)
00100         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_glossy_indirect, sample, L->indirect_glossy);
00101     if(flag & PASS_TRANSMISSION_INDIRECT)
00102         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_transmission_indirect, sample, L->indirect_transmission);
00103     if(flag & PASS_DIFFUSE_DIRECT)
00104         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_diffuse_direct, sample, L->direct_diffuse);
00105     if(flag & PASS_GLOSSY_DIRECT)
00106         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_glossy_direct, sample, L->direct_glossy);
00107     if(flag & PASS_TRANSMISSION_DIRECT)
00108         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_transmission_direct, sample, L->direct_transmission);
00109 
00110     if(flag & PASS_EMISSION)
00111         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_emission, sample, L->emission);
00112     if(flag & PASS_BACKGROUND)
00113         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_background, sample, L->background);
00114     if(flag & PASS_AO)
00115         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_ao, sample, L->ao);
00116 
00117     if(flag & PASS_DIFFUSE_COLOR)
00118         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_diffuse_color, sample, L->color_diffuse);
00119     if(flag & PASS_GLOSSY_COLOR)
00120         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_glossy_color, sample, L->color_glossy);
00121     if(flag & PASS_TRANSMISSION_COLOR)
00122         kernel_write_pass_float3(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_transmission_color, sample, L->color_transmission);
00123     if(flag & PASS_SHADOW)
00124         kernel_write_pass_float4(buffer + kernel_data.film.pass_shadow, sample, L->shadow);
00125 #endif
00126 }
